r.s: provides an API for the administration of Cyrus IMAP servers.
r.d: API for the administration of Cyrus IMAP servers. It can be used to create,delete and modify users and it's properties (Quota and ACL)
r.n: QA release Bug #1279 Net_Cyrus::connect() returns nothing damian Bug #1705 Documentation bug damian Bug #1710 _raiseError() doesn not return a PEAR_Error Object damian Bug #4949 deleteMailbox() tries to reset ACL on deleted mailbox amistry Bug #5025 Mailboxes in a not default cyrus partition amistry Bug #5778 renameUser: The user "user/....." doesn't exist amistry Bug #7666 Missing closing PHP tag amistry Bug #9528 function connect does not set _user amistry Bug #11443 renameUser does not release old username properly amistry
